channel.title: Pages on Grocery Stories
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Grocery Stories

item.description: Hello! I’m Sarah Eden. Grocery Stories is about community and food. It started out mostly about grocery stores — places I’ve been interested ever since shopping and working at a family-run Lebanese grocery store as a teenager — but then it grew because getting the ingredients is only the middle. You’ll find stories here about the people, shops, and food I love most, around London and in places I visit.
